text: {"answer": "A", "reasoning": "All three statements are correct: i) EuErbVO contains a special rule for multiâ€‘national persons and the draft IPRG plans a similar rule; ii) the supervisory authority can determine the termination of a will executor when the executor notifies it; iii) the applicable law under EuErbVO must be a Member State law, so the regulation does not have erga omnes effect. Hence no statement is false."}
